price: 67. Quienes se arrepientan, crean con sinceridad y actúen rectamente estarán entre los triunfadores.
arabic: فَأَمَّا مَن تَابَ وَءَامَنَ وَعَمِلَ صَٰلِحٗا فَعَسَىٰٓ أَن يَكُونَ مِنَ ٱلۡمُفۡلِحِينَ

version.title: Spanish Translation (Latin America) - Noor International
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Spanish (Latin America) by Noor International (Ed. 2017)

meta.transliteration: fa-ammā man tāba waāmana waʿamila ṣāliḥan faʿasā an yakūna mina al-muf'liḥīna
